data.name: S.K.I.L.L. - Special Force 2 - Specialist Pack
data.detailed_description:
S.K.I.L.L. - Special Force 2 - Specialist Pack


The Specialist Pack offers a great variety of items you can't miss!

Night Fox
Pretty deadly! Don't let her looks confuse you, she is every bit of dangerous she can be. When playing with this character you also receive additional 50% EXP and 50% SP from your matches.

GIGN Riot Guard
The GIGN Riot Guards are organized, deployed, trained and equipped to confront crowds, protests and riots. This special unit comes with a bonus of 75% extra EXP and 40% extra SP.

KSK
Only the toughest guys can join this German Special Force unit. Dominate the battlefields of S.K.I.L.L. - Special Force 2 with this unit and get a bonus of 40% on EXP and a boost of 40% on SP.

Permanent CAMOs
The pack includes 6 different permanent CAMOS which you can use to give your favorite weapon a cool new look.
You will receive a Spetsnaz, a Dandelion, a Multicam and a Flower CAMO, along with the Silver Lightning FX and the Circuit FX with cool special effects.

Scare them out
A scared opponent is an easy opponent. Grab this permanent Zombie Mask and become the terror of the battlefield.

Boost, Boost, Boost
With this pack you will receive 4 SP-Boosts for 7 days each, you should be able to get tons of money before these ran out.
Additionally, you will also receive 4 EXP-Boosts - also for 7 days each. This will boost your experience bar to the sky.

Even more money
The rest is up to you! Get 75.000 SP to spend in-game however you want right form the start!

How do I unlock my DLC in the game?

After purchase of a DLC pack, you will be presented with a Steam product key. Log in to S.K.I.L.L., head to the shop and go to 'Top up Cash'. This will open a window with a button labelled 'Gameforge Coupon'. Click this and follow the directions to redeem your Steam product key. The contents of the DLC pack will then appear in your inventory in the 'Gifts' section.

data.short_description: S.K.I.L.L. - Special Force 2 is a fast-paced, action-packed shooter based on the Unreal Engine 3. The game features a wide range of game modes, tons of maps and a huge selection of weapons.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Turkish*, Czech*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: P4 3,0 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6600 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: Core2 Duo E6600 or comparable
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8600 GT or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
